senses.sense_definition: A type of versatile material used to create electrical circuits and mechanisms, primarily in the video game Minecraft.

examples.text: He gathered plenty of <w>redstone</w> while mining deep underground.
You need to place a <w>redstone</w> torch to activate the powered rail.

senses.sense_definition: The entire system of circuitry and logic gates created using redstone components.

examples.text: Learning <w>redstone</w> allows players to automate complex farming tasks.
The complexity of <w>redstone</w> engineering requires a lot of practice to master.

senses.sense_definition: A surname used to identify a person's family.

examples.text: Mr. <w>Redstone</w> gave a keynote speech at the media conference.
The <w>Redstone</w> family has owned this property for several generations.

senses.sense_definition: A census-designated place and unincorporated community in Pitkin County, Colorado.

examples.text: They planned a weekend trip to visit the historic sites in <w>Redstone</w>.
The village of <w>Redstone</w> is nestled in a picturesque valley.
